Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Airlie Beach, at Boathaven Spa Resort is by the ocean and convenient to Airlie Beach Lagoon and Abell Point Marina. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Bicentennial Park and Cannonvale Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 27 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private balconies. 68-cm plasma televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided weekly.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Airlie Beach, at Boathaven Spa Resort is by the ocean and convenient to Airlie Beach Lagoon and Abell Point Marina. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Bicentennial Park and Cannonvale Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Airlie Beach Lagoon - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Abell Point Marina - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Bicentennial Park - 2.7 km / 1.6 mi
Cannonvale Beach - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Shute Harbour Jetty - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
Great Whitsunday Walk - 8.3 km / 5.1 mi
Conway National Park - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
Daydream Port - 9.7 km / 6 mi
Daydream Reef - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi
Daydream Beach - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi
Sandy Bay - 11 km / 6.8 mi
South Molle Island Golf Course - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi
Cedar Creek Falls - 11.9 km / 7.4 mi
South Molle Island Jetty - 12 km / 7.4 mi
Pelican Island - 15.2 km / 9.4 mi

The preferred airport for at Boathaven Spa Resort is Proserpine, QLD (PPP-Whitsunday Coast) - 30 km / 18.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
